description: This file defines the VisitController class in a Spring MVC application, managing pet visit creation and processing within the pet clinic project.

classes.name: VisitController
classes.description: Spring MVC controller handling pet visit creation and management.

methods.name: setAllowedFields
methods.description: Configures WebDataBinder to disallow binding of the 'id' field.

methods.name: loadPetWithVisit
methods.description: Prepares a Visit object associated with a pet and owner, adding it to the model.

methods.name: initNewVisitForm
methods.description: Initializes the form for creating a new pet visit.

methods.name: processNewVisitForm
methods.description: Processes the submitted form for creating a new pet visit, saving data and redirecting.
